text: David Ross Ardern (born 28 February 1954) is a New Zealand diplomat and former police officer. He is currently the Administrator of Tokelau. He was the High Commissioner of New Zealand to Niue from 2014 to 2018, and as Niue's police commissioner from 2005 to 2009. Ardern is the father of the Prime Minister, Jacinda Ardern. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Jacinda Ardern Category:Police officers Category:New Zealand politicians
title: Ross Ardern
